summary: Completed comprehensive mobile responsive testing for ConnectionsPage across mobile (375px), tablet (768px), and desktop (1920px) viewports. All responsive breakpoints working correctly with proper card/table switching, horizontal scrolling, and 2x2/4-column stats layouts.
passed_tests: Mobile (375px): Cards view instead of table - ✅ Working
Mobile (375px): Stats cards in 2x2 grid - ✅ Working
Mobile (375px): Horizontal scroll tabs - ✅ Working
Mobile (375px): Search functionality - ✅ Working
Mobile (375px): Filter panel (full screen) - ✅ Working
Mobile (375px): Compare modal - ✅ Working
Mobile (375px): Handle display (@vitalikbuterin, @cz_binance, @a16z) - ✅ Working
Tablet (768px): Table view with horizontal scroll - ✅ Working
Tablet (768px): Stats cards in 4 columns - ✅ Working
Tablet (768px): Cards hidden, table visible - ✅ Working
Tablet (768px): Filter panel as dropdown - ✅ Working
Desktop (1920px): Full table view - ✅ Working
Desktop (1920px): All 6 table columns visible - ✅ Working
Desktop (1920px): Stats cards in 4 columns - ✅ Working
Desktop (1920px): Expected handles present (vitalikbuterin, cz_binance, a16z) - ✅ Working
Desktop (1920px): Influence scores and risk badges - ✅ Working
Desktop (1920px): Search and filtering - ✅ Working
Desktop (1920px): Column sorting - ✅ Working
Cross-viewport: Compare functionality - ✅ Working
Cross-viewport: Responsive CSS breakpoints - ✅ Working
